body.name: Clip on Light Reading Lights , 48 LED USB Desk Lamp with 3 Color Modes 10 Brightness, Eye Protection Book Clamp Light , 360 ° Flexible Gooseneck Clamp Lamp for Desk Headboard and Video Conferencing

features: 【EYE PROTECTION & ECO FRIENDLY】: Clamp Light Made of 48 LED lighting high quality, no flicker, no dazzle, help those who read and work hours a day to protect eyesight and reduce eye strain, ideal for reading, drawing, work, study. Best Gift for kids & bookworms.As an eco-friendly reading desk lamp, it consumes 80% less power than traditional incandescent lights so you can reduce your carbon footprint while also reducing your electricity bill.

【3 COLOR MODES 10 BRIGHTNESS LEVELS】: reading lights featured with 3 color temperature: amber / warm light (3000K), warm–white light (4500K) and white light (6500K). Each lighting mode has 10 brightness dimming levels, available for your different needs. Clip on bedside or headboard and reading in bed, comfortable light brings you comfortable life!

【MEMORY FUNCTION & BRIGHT ENOUGH】: The clip on desk light will be on your previous setting when turning on again to catch your lighting preference. Compared with 24 LED, 48 LED is brighter, this will reduce your fatigue from working or reading and it can also be used as a video conference light, easily to meet your ideal lighting needs , to make your skin more perfect and more suitable your environment.

【USB POWERED & FLEXIBLE GOOSENECK】: 360° adjustable gooseneck & ring light design, easily to direct the light wherever you want for best viewing. The clamp lamp comes with a 3.6ft convenient USB charging cord, able to plug into any available USB port, no more worry about the distance between the clip lamp and socket. You can clip lamp to a desk, the headboard, etc.

【MULTI USAGE & LIFETIME SERVICE】: clip on light can be widely used to reading, office, studying, remote working, video conferencing, zoom calls, self broadcasting and so on. All of our products passed the stringent quality test. If you product arrived faulty or damaged, please contact our seller support and we will repond by the earliest time. We provide 1year warranty service! Even if the return window is closed, you can still do this. 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was great while it lastted
reviews.reviewText: I liked the convenience of the light, with the lower brightness for reading. The problem is that is only lasted 8 months. The switch went out on it. The return period is 30 days, so I am out of luck. Buy at your own risk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought it in May and stopped working in November, very bad product, it wasn't worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Switch has a short life
reviews.reviewText: I used this light for my home coffee brew setup, so turned it on once or twice a day for 10-15 min for a year.The light is bright, adjustable, offers two colors (colder and warmer). I like it.The on/off switch stopped working after a year for me. Others also reported the same issue. I ended up replacing the entire controller and switch to a regular light switch. For $10 it is a good buy, but the design flaw is still unacceptable imho. The little switch that keeps dying is worth probably 3 cents, why not replace it for a 5 cent version that would actually last?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lighting from distance
reviews.reviewText: Impressed on the great quality of lamps this is. Works great! Just like i was expecting it. I loved the different settings that it comes with and how easy is to adjust them. Also i love how you can adjust it anywhere and i can even take it to travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dpower Clip Light
reviews.reviewText: I use this light when doing my readings and it works well. It has several lighting adjustments and it is just great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as bright as you might like
reviews.reviewText: I just received this lamp today. First the good. It is very flexible, and the neck is very strong. The lamp will not "droop". Second, the clamp is very strong and is metal so it won't break. Third, I like all of the adjustments and colors, although to me the "warm" color is very yellow and I will probably never use it.Now for the bad. This light is not nearly as bright as I expected it would be. It's probably only about 1/2 as bright as it needs to be (in my opinion) to really brightly light up my desk. With lights on in the room or a lot of daylight, you can't tell that the lamp is even on even at full brightness. For my purposes I guess it will work. My room is fairly dark and I just need it to light my computer keyboard and small surrounding surface.This light would be better suited for attaching to a headboard for night reading or things like that.All in all, it is a nice light that I guess I'll keep. I spent too much time researching to come up with this one... I don't want to do it all over again. But I do wish it was 2x brighter.4 days later: I returned the light. For me, it was just not viable as a desk lamp. I purchased a different light that is 10W and it is much brighter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Different Light Modes are Cool
reviews.reviewText: Simple setup and takes up such little space. Cool options not just having multiple dim up to bright settings but also different shades of light - cool, warm, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Taking a gamble buying this… but I love it
reviews.reviewText: When I first bought the lamp the different light modes were not working (took a star off for that). I was annoyed by this. There should be better quality control. I liked the idea and style of the lamp so I tested my luck out and took a gamble placing another order. The second one (the one I have now) works really well. I wish the lamp got a bit brighter (so I can use it as a meaningful light source for filming) but it does well as a study and work light. I love that I can move it and flex it but didn’t like that the first one didn’t work. Buying this is a risk but if you get one that works you’ll be happy with it.
